Hype is becoming *real*.

I started playing on version 0.16 of Kerbal Space Program, after a while of playing the demo (0.13.3 at the time). I bought it just after 0.16 came out if I recall correctly. The game was so different back then. It was 0.16 when the game first started to become what it was today. The large rockets and EVAs and having both Mun and Minmus. Even more at 0.17, when it added planets. I never imagined what the game would become.
